abilities.name: Uplifting Glow
abilities.text: As long as Illumise is in play, Volbeat's Retreat Cost is 0.

attacks.name: Toxic Vibration
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned. If tails, the Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Pester
attacks.text: If the Defending Pokémon is affected by a Special Condition, this attack does 20 damage plus 20 more damage.
